title: Bitcoin Settles In Near $70k After Wild Roller-Coaster Ride
description:
Bitcoin was trading on either side of $70,000 on Monday following a roller-coaster ride at the end of last week.
The original cryptocurrency was little changed at that level following the wide daily swings of more than 13% that undercut investors confidence. Bitcoin on Thursday plunged to $60,033, its lowest since October 2024, before rallying back above $70,000 on Friday. Traders remain on edge.  Bloomberg's Zeke Faux discusses bitcoin's wild swings (Source: Bloomberg)

title: This Week's IQ Test on 'ETF IQ'
description: Joel Weber, Head of Games at Bloomberg and cohost of the Trillions podcast, joined Bloomberg's ETF IQ for an ETF-themed trivia segment with hosts Katie Greifeld, Eric Balchunas, and Scarlet Fu. Catch more games on bloomberg.com/pointed and QUIZ <GO> in the Terminal. (Source: Bloomberg)

title: The Majority of BTC Investors Are Still In: Bitwise CIO Matt Hougan
description: Bitwise CIO Matt Hougan discusses the recent selling pressure in the crypto market, attributing it mainly to retail Bitcoin investors taking profits, while institutional investors are steadily increasing their hold through ETFs. He highlights the resilience of dedicated investor groups, such as those supporting XRP, which has seen consistent inflows following a favorable SEC ruling. He speaks with Scarlet Fu, Eric Balchunas and Katie Greifeld on ‘ETF IQ.’ (Source: Bloomberg)
